system.description:
Telling convincing lies, as well as feigning emotion, belief, or frame of mind. If you understand the person you are attempting to deceive 65 (roll 9+ on Perception + Folk Ken), you gain a bonus of +1 to your Guile roll. This Ability also covers disguising yourself, and pretending to be something you are not. It is often an opposed roll, against the victims Perception + Folk Ken or, for disguise, Perception + Awareness. 
Specialties:  particular sorts of deception, lying to authority, fast talk, elaborate lies. (General)
